column2: still , at least from my perspective , a great camera for the money , and i 'm a happy camper ! .
in conclusion , i gave the ipod a 4/5 because anything this expensive should would work just about flawlessly .
other than that , the simian series 60 os is great and offers lots of proprietary software that will work on your phone if you 're willing to hunt for it .
it doesn 't stink , ever ( like some have assumed since it doesn 't wrap each diaper into its own neat little cocoon ) .
on occasion i 'm not able to connect to the phone with isync via bluetooth but i found that rebooting the phone seems to solve this problem .
i could hardly use it without a recharge in 2 days ! .
there is also no voice recording , something most if not all mp3 players have that the ipod doesn 't .
in noisy environment , it 's hard to hear from the earpiece .
